text:
="preserve">Gala is a variety of eating and cooking apple. This variety is crisp, juicy and sweet. It has a red [https://usapple.org/apple-variety/gala skin that can have some additional yellow color. The gala apple was created in] New Zealand [https://usapple.org/apple-variety/gala by crossing Kidd’s orange red and golden delicious apples.]
In the United States, it was projected in 2019 to be the most highly produced apple variety.
